scripts.build:dev: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider env-cmd -f .env.development next build && next export
scripts.build:prod: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider env-cmd -f .env.production next build && next export
scripts.build:stage: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider env-cmd -f .env.staging next build && next export
scripts.build:ui: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider env-cmd -f .env.ui next build && next export
